item.title: Generate beautiful JSON from PostgreSQL
item.description: Table of Contents 1. Get the table data as JSON objects 2. Get the table data with specific columns 3. Get the table data as a single JSON object 4. Build JSON object with multiple tables 5. Build JSON object by resolving foreign keys Conclusion PostgreSQL provides a set of built-in JSON creation functions that can be used to build basic JSON structures.
